findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions excludeFromDividends() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to control various aspects of the contract, including enabling/disabling trading, blocking/unblocking accounts, modifying fees and fee receivers, and withdrawing contract ETHs.
